title: "MATRIX AI Consortium at UTSA awarded $200K to study dementia in Hispanic communities"

McDermott Endowed Chair in Engineering, was recently awarded $200,000 from the San Antonio Medical Foundation to apply artificial intelligence (AI) models to dementia research serving historically underserved populations,"
